website_summaries.verdict: New design delivers plenty of power for charging phones or radio listening.
pros: Versatile portable radio that can draw power from the solar panel or the hand crank
Has a 2,000 mAh power bank, so you can charge other devices if needed
Provides access to AM, FM, and NOAA radio channels
cons: Durability is a bit of a question mark

customer_reviews.title: Must-have all-in-one tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a must-have tool, the rechargeable battery with solar supports the dual-LED light resources, plus radio and weather alert, it all gives me a peace of mind on potential emergencies. The radio is easy on tuning, and it is light weight. The only thing I would suggest to the seller is to make sure on the bottom of the radio, switch the power source from AAA to Lithium-ion before box it. I thought it was not working after charging for hours until I see the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Flowerinfog

customer_reviews.title: 3 ways to charge and it fits in my purse !
customer_reviews.text: I tried to take a video of the whole radio. The hand crank works, there is 2 flash light. The flip one turns on when flipped out and auto turns off when you put it back down (with solar panel facing up) Radio works well, you turn the volume all the way down to turn it OFF. There is a switch at the bottom to use AAA battery or the battery itself. You can charge the device via usb , solar, or hand crank. It will charge your phone too. It comes with a micro usb cord. Took pictures for instructions in case anyone loses the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and highly functional
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this unit being in the price range that it was in but decided, what the heck. I stand corrected... This little gem is actually really nice and functional. Both lights are very bright, the crank on the back is substantial, and overall heft of the unit is good. This came with astonishingly good instructions, was well packaged, and arrived on time. Sound quality is decent enough, although it’s not something your gonna want to jam too for any length of time. This is in my Bug Box now and hopefully holds a change for extended periods.
customer_reviews.author: Dieselmike

customer_reviews.title: I love this radio Bought it for my GO Bag.  Everything works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this radio for my GO Bag. Everything works on it. It brought in AM and FM radio stations. The flashlight and the siren work. I wold have liked it to be a little lighter in order to carry it in my backpack but I realize with all the things it does it would have to be heavier than I would like. For use at home in an emergency it will be very useful.
customer_reviews.author: ROSEBUD

customer_reviews.title: Great all in one emergency radio/light/charger.
customer_reviews.text: Nice radio, I like the solar panel! Has a convenient wrist strap. AM/FM/weather bands. Sound quality is good for what it is; I have hearing aids and the speaker sounds clear, not garbled. Flashlight, reading light, alarm. Allows you to charge android or iPhone devices. Great addition to a bug out bag or for power outages.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Hong

customer_reviews.title: nice weather radio with several great features
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I bought this radio is that it’s rechargeable with a usb interface. No batteries are needed. This is very convenient. The hand crank is a nice additional feature. I still remember during Hurricane Irma when the power was lost for about 30 hours and there was no cell phone signals, I had no such a radio to keep informed. So this is a must have for such occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Dav

customer_reviews.title: Great Emergency Radio for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The only downside was the switch from AAA batteries power to the rechargeable battery on the bottom of the radio. The simple act of moving the radio against a hard surface will flip that switch. I keep batteries in it anyway, so it's not enough of a downer to lose a star.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Turnipseed

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Very important for when the weather is baf
customer_reviews.text: I really love this thing I use it for when there’s emergencies in our lights go out it works great it always comes on it charges soul or you can hand crank it you can charge your phone it has a radio it has a flashlight it put off a lot of light it’s awesome
customer_reviews.author: christi Bruch

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love that this product is small and light weight, makes it easier to carry/store. Radio plays with good sound quality. Both the lights are very bright. Very easy to set up. Well worth the money for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Strausser Sr

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this! The radio's sound quality is surprisingly clear and can get very loud if needed. Between all the power options, it gives you peace of mind that you'll never be in an actual emergency without the ability to use it.
customer_reviews.author: richinsgirl

customer_reviews.title: A good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised which makes it a great buy. I'm using mine to scare away deer. They eat a lot of my plants and I'm looking for any help I can get. If this doesn't work on deer it's not the products fault. Husband said it's a pretty good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue E. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Emergency must have! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a true must have for emergencies. I love all the options especially being able to charge devices. The lights are bright. There are options for FM, AM and Wide band. Every household needs one of these!
customer_reviews.author: I_luv_Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Emergency Radio
customer_reviews.text: Sleek smooth texture and flashligh works with solar power li-ion option. Fantastic to bring along very portable! Full radio knobs to change stations with battery insert for ease.
customer_reviews.author: Chaelee White

customer_reviews.title: Surprised me! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It really surprised me. It is sooooo good! There are so many ways to power it, including solar, hand crank, Li-ion battery, AAA battery. Most importantly, it could be used as a power bank to charge my phone. This function is so awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Leilei

customer_reviews.title: Great little EMER radio
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but what a little great emergency radio. I purchased for a friend in a nursing home. Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: charge your phone and keep up on the news.
customer_reviews.text: This came just in time. We had some bad storms and the lights went out. Not only was i able to charge my phine but i was also able to keep track of things on the weather radio. Very durable and strong. i feel like it is going to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: broz

customer_reviews.title: Flip the switch!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for emergencies. Be sure to flip the switch on the bottom from “AAA” to “LI-ion” if you want to power using crank/solar power. This radio works as advertised and I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Addict

customer_reviews.title: Weather radio For the outdoors men and good for emergency
customer_reviews.text: This radio is the nice radio for the camp or any emergency situation. I have not Used the radio too much yet. But everything is good on this radio so far. I would recommend this radio to others.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Charging ports, crank, emergency 🚨 light
customer_reviews.text: Very handy little radio. Can be used for outdoors as well as bad weather. We have tornados here. It’s made a nice addition to our basement.
customer_reviews.author: Kozy

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to access NOAH .
customer_reviews.text: This little radio does a little of everything. I tune in every morning to check the weather. I really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lalley

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I tested all of the radio functions, and it works just as advertised. Although I haven't tried out the hand crank to see if it would charge bc it will just take too long. It charges fine, and it works with batteries fine as well. I am in the process of building an emergency kit for my house and I am going to buy another radio to keep in my car for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Good for money
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t used it yet. It’s for emergency. Seems simple to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Marthe P. Charbonneau

customer_reviews.title: Neat design emergency use radio
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, it has hand roll power , also solar power both provide pretty good power, when u need a emergency radio, this is the one. Recommand to buy.
customer_reviews.author: xyzfarrior824

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Put it straight in my emergency pack. Make sure to mark your local noaa weather station on it. The light works, hand crank, charger everything
customer_reviews.author: Mariela

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the money fits in back pack good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great hand held crank emergency
customer_reviews.text: This is smaller than I thought it would be. It's definitely a hand held type radio. Charged up fine with the crank. Let my phone charge on it and it worked well. I feel it was a great purchase, and I am comfortable relying on it in an emergency
customer_reviews.author: Steve Volz

customer_reviews.title: Helpful in case of emergency
customer_reviews.text: Great product with all the emergency features one would need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my grandparents to have at home and while in their storm shelter. We were all very pleased with it being lightweight, having a great light, radio, and multiple charging options.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased amazing emergency radio. The most important thing for me is that it has best sound quality. The features is outstanding and fulfill my expectations. Nice outlook and smart. Easy to use and there is automatically broadcast weather alert. Very happy to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hangjian Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Life Safer
customer_reviews.text: I feel so safe with this solar and hand crank weather radio, which would also charge my cell phone in an emergency!
customer_reviews.author: Annalu

customer_reviews.title: Great little product
customer_reviews.text: This has it all for an emergency! A flashlight, solar, battery, or hand crank charging. You can charge your phone, it's water resistant and you can use your headphones too. Great little product!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Everything and more
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Yes! Yes! Everything works perfectly. Charges phone, hand crank for power worst perfect! Sound is amazing, flashlight works well. Couldn't be happier for the quality, price and use!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have to crank it that long it started to work almost immediately. Great sound and it really did charge my phone. so far works pretty good:)
customer_reviews.author: Angela Cook:)

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I came across this radio! It is highly necessary for emergency situations. It is small and practical but has a lot of built in features. Great purchase! 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Esme Romero

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Small, cheap and poor sound quality. I guess I should have invested more time to research before I pulled the trigger on this little toy.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Best little radio
customer_reviews.text: I like the different ways to power the radio and recharge battery. Also it can operate on standard batteries as a fail safe method. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Colonel

customer_reviews.title: perfect addition to emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: excellent. all in one. light. radio. phone charger. + solar vs AAA option. best $ compared to others. must have for emergency prep kit
customer_reviews.author: DOUGLAS STURM

customer_reviews.title: This radio works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this device after a recent power outage. It arrived promptly. We tested it and found all features work well as described in the instruction manual. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke second time charging
customer_reviews.text: The second time we used this the usb plug in area was pushed into the unit and broke
customer_reviews.author: Heather Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Radio
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good for the machine that it is. If it was bigger, it would get lower.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Hartford

customer_reviews.title: I feel much better having this emergency radio
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing little radio and the lights are so bright!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Curran

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's just what we had been looking for. Easy to use, and small enough not to take up space. May end up ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Carr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: This hand held radio is perfect. It is easy to use and is small enough to fit into a small purse/bag.
customer_reviews.author: Seanna M.

customer_reviews.title: Panel solar
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but crank seems like it can snap off if cranked too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel calmen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for when the power goes out
customer_reviews.text: Great little radio. Has everything I need on it. Weather radio works good.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: I’d pass on this unit
customer_reviews.text: I cranked, as per instructions, for about 3 minutes. At that point the internals for the crank gave up the ghost. Didn’t even survive long enough to charge/activate battery. I would not buy again. If you should chose to buy I’d definitely test before you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This doesnt even work. Dont waste your money its pure junk
customer_reviews.author: MegM

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first charge.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after removing the charging cord after charging the Li-Ion battery for the first time, the female receiver for the charging cord fell into the inside of the radio and I can no longer charge the Li-Ion battery.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cuppia

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Got it. Charged it. It didn’t work. I didn’t expect much, but no light, no radio, etc....
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW B.

customer_reviews.title: The Weather Band Did NOT Work!  Radio, Yes, WB, NO
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use as a weather alert radio. The radio worked, but the weather band did not. We had one night when there were tornado warnings and I slept blissfully UNaware, while my neighbor told me she spent half the night in her laundry room! Called Amazon and they took care of it for me. I've purchased another brand and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: EPW001

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Radio is great but I tried it out in the sun to see of it charges and left it out a whole afternoon when there was lots of light and it didn't charge. The handle turns on the light but it won't turn on with the sun like it says. And with just the handle it takes a long time to chargea few percents up.
customer_reviews.author: Vianey Juárez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for iPhone or Android charging
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great but the charger part doesn't work for iPhone or Android. Even tried our cables and they don't fit, not sure what kind of cell phone it will charge but it isn't an iPhone or Android
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Emergency Radio 2020 New Version Bonpro Weather Radio with Solar and Crank Charger with Flashlight, Reading Lamp and 2000mAh Power Bank NOAA Weather Radio
feature_bullets: 【NOAA weather radio 】This NOAA weather alert radio are specially designed for emergency need. It will automatically alert you if any emergency warning is issued. Noaa weather radio has standard analog tuning of AM/FM/SW/7 NOAA weather channels. It is a particular device designed to receive emergency warnings for various life-threatening weather events such as cyclones, hurricanes, tsunamis, tornadoes ,severe storms and other weather disasters.

【Emergency Radio Ready for all emergencies 】This BY042 weather emergency radio is a versatile product, which will broadcast the latest weather and hazard information for your area in time, such as earthquake, hurricane, tornado, blizzard, or any other natural disaster. Using FM, AM and NOAA weather forecast station, you will be able to get the latest emergency news and make the best preparation for it. You can also get the latest weather broadcasting even in non-stormy weather.

【5 ways to power the weather radio& 2000mAh power bank 】This hand crank radio with hand crank, solar charging, Micro USB cable and 3 LR03 AAA batteries(not included). This emergency radio can be charge USB port devices such as smart phones, to keep you connected and powered.

【NOAA weather radio channel broadcasts】This weather station radio will dependably deliver up-to-the-second emergency weather forecasts and emergency radio news broadcasts when tuned to NOAA station and AM/FM stations.

【Crank radio charging power bank】This wind up radio works as an emergency mobile battery charger with built-in standard DC 5V USB output port for charging mobile devices, such as smart phones, GPS units, MP3 players, digital cameras, and etc. Other features include a 5-LED reading lamp, LED flashlight and a red LED S.O.S. beacon light.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars219 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
